about_the_game:
About this game

This is a stand -alone game with a background of Xiu Xian. You will be represented by the story of the novel protagonist Zhang Zhixuan's perspective in the story framework of the original novel "The Evergreen of Xiandao". The game basically follows the plot of the novel. The functional gameplay is not lacking in the original settings. It also has unique fun. It also has a lot of original branch line plot content to fill all corners of the game world, making your adventure journey endless.
Xiantu Xiuyuan, I am not alone. Here you can work with the relatives of the same door to the avenue to write a dream -like and magnificent life.

※ Restore the plot of the novel and enjoy the surprise
The game will be dedicated to restoring the plot content of the realm of gas refining, building foundation, Zifu, Jin Dan, Yuanying and other realms. It provides five map areas set up based on the original work to explore freely and play the footprint of Zhang Zhixuan, the protagonist of the novel. Following the avenue, he experienced the unique charm of Xianxian in the situation.


※ The diversified development system, the battle for Xiu Xianxian
In the game, you can collect and upgrade various magic weapons, supernatural powers, internal skills, and mind tactics, practice the way of alchemy casting, improve your self -cultivation from multiple dimensions, and use flexible combinations Shenwei, helping you frustrate to the strong enemies, constantly break through the bottleneck, and finally reach the top of the world of cultivation!


※ Automatically hang up and grow, a journey of comfortable cultivation
There is a leisure mechanism such as hanging up and automatic combat in the game, so that you can experience the growth and improvement of the character without spending too much effort. In addition, the game also designed the original masterpiece in the original book, further enriching the development of content, broadening the channel acquisition channels, and assisting players to reach the end of the avenue faster.
